set(GMOCK_INCLUDE_DIR ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include PARENT_SCOPE)
set(GMOCK_LIBRARIES ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib/libgmock.a  ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib/libgmock_main.a PARENT_SCOPE)

set(GTEST_INCLUDE_DIR ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/include PARENT_SCOPE)
set(GTEST_LIBRARIES ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib/libgtest.a ${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}/lib/libgtest_main.a PARENT_SCOPE)
